Articles.Content: Does any of you knows a game about building aircraft, with reasonably realistic aerodynamics?
Kerbal Space Program is good, just get FAR.
Outside of KSP+mods as needed, you could try [Simple Planes](http://www.simpleplanes.com/) or the plane builder for [X-Plane](http://www.x-plane.com/).
